title: New5hark
summary: A fullstack app backed by MongoDB and a frontend powered by React. In this app a user can create an account, and create a day todo list of activities to do for the day.
imageAlt: image of new shark app preview

title: Social Burger
summary: A fullstack app backed by MySQL and serverside rendering with handlebars.js for storing a user's burgers they can create and share
imageAlt: image of social burger app preview

title: Social Network API
summary: A backend with MongoDB that can CRUD users, friends, and are all assigned to REST API routes
imageAlt: image of social media api preview

title: Stock Portfolio Analyzer
summary: A jQuery Frontend site to visualize stock data from a third party API using Chart.js
imageAlt: image of stock portfolio analyzer preview
